item.title: Custom Image (Under Construction)
item.description: In this tutorial, we will guide you through the steps to create a custom image that allows you to install custom software packages and later reuse the image for creating new LSF clusters. We assume you have followed the steps in II - Standing up an LSF Cluster to create an existing LSF cluster, and we will reuse its VPC infrastructure to create a VSI within it.
